promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive epic butterfly fighting-type pokemon with a regal crystal core. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Monarchrystaleon, a a massive epic butterfly fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Meteor Smash, Nom-Nom-Nom Incisors. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "fighting" or "Monarchrystaleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, butterfly-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This regal leonine creature flutters around combat zones, hurling celestial energy with Meteor Smash. Its insectoid jaws crunch anything in sight.
